metadata.title: CVE-2016-10130 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The http_connect function in transports/http.c in libgit2 before 0.24.6 and0.25.x before 0.25.1 might allow man-in-the-middle attackers to spoofservers by leveraging clobbering of the error variable.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10130` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgit2-27 - 0.26.0+dfsg.1-1.1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.26.0+dfsg.1-1.1build1').
